author: amaltaro
body:
First WMCore pre-release meant to be fully compatible with CouchDB 3.1.
Special deployment instructions will be shared by Monday, given that we need to replicate current databases (from CouchDB 1.6.1) to the new CouchDB instance running 3.1.2.
title: WMCore release candidate 2.1.0.pre2 for HG2207
